00049 namespace {
00050   const char *usage[] = {
00051     "usage: localBroker [OPTIONS]",
00052     "",
00053     "OPTIONS:",
00054     "  --config=<file>       Read configuration from <file>.  The default config",
00055     "                        file is \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel",
00056     "                        install directory",
00057     "  --listen-port=<port>  Listen for connections on port <port>",
00058     "  --pidfile=<fname>     Write the process ID to <fname> upon successful startup",
00059     "  --help                Display this help text and exit",
00060     "  --verbose,-v          Generate verbose output",
00061     "",
00062     "This program is the local DFS broker server.",
00063     (const char *)0
00064   };
00065   const int DEFAULT_PORT    = 38030;
00066   const int DEFAULT_WORKERS = 20;
00067 }
00068 
00069

00074 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00075   string configFile = "";
00076   string pidFile = "";
00077   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00078   bool verbose = false;
00079   int reactorCount, workerCount;
00080   uint16_t port = 0;
00081   Comm *comm;
00082   BrokerPtr brokerPtr;
00083   ApplicationQueuePtr appQueuePtr;
00084   struct sockaddr_in listenAddr;
00085   int error;
00086 
00087   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00088   
00089   if (argc > 1) {
00090     for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00091       if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00092         configFile = &argv[i][9];
00093       else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--listen-port=", 14))
00094         port = (uint16_t)atoi(&argv[i][14]);
00095       else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--pidfile=", 10))
00096         pidFile = &argv[i][10];
00097       else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00098         verbose = true;
00099       else
00100         Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00101     }
00102   }
00103 
00104   if (configFile == "")
00105     configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00106 
00107   if (!FileUtils::exists(configFile.c_str())) {
00108     cerr << "Error: Unable to open config file '" << configFile << "'" << endl;
00109     exit(0);
00110   }
00111 
00112   props_ptr = new Properties(configFile);
00113   if (verbose)
00114     props_ptr->set("verbose", "true");
00115 
00116   if (port == 0)
00117     port       = props_ptr->get_int("DfsBroker.Local.Port",     DEFAULT_PORT);
00118   reactorCount = props_ptr->get_int("DfsBroker.Local.Reactors", System::get_processor_count());
00119   workerCount  = props_ptr->get_int("DfsBroker.Local.Workers",  DEFAULT_WORKERS);
00120 
00121   ReactorFactory::initialize(reactorCount);
00122 
00123   comm = new Comm();
00124 
00125   if (verbose) {
00126     cout << "CPU count = " << System::get_processor_count() << endl;
00127     cout << "DfsBroker.Local.Port=" << port << endl;
00128     cout << "DfsBroker.Local.Reactors=" << reactorCount << endl;
00129     cout << "DfsBroker.Local.Workers=" << workerCount << endl;
00130   }
00131 
00132   InetAddr::initialize(&listenAddr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00133 
00134   brokerPtr = new LocalBroker(props_ptr);
00135   appQueuePtr = new ApplicationQueue(workerCount);
00136   ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfPtr(new DfsBroker::ConnectionHandlerFactory(comm, appQueuePtr, brokerPtr));
00137   if ((error = comm->listen(listenAddr, chfPtr)) != Error::OK) {
00138     std::string addrStr;
00139     HT_ERRORF("Problem listening for connections on %s - %s", InetAddr::string_format(addrStr, listenAddr), Error::get_text(error));
00140     return 1;
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (pidFile != "") {
00144     fstream filestr (pidFile.c_str(), fstream::out);
00145     filestr << getpid() << endl;
00146     filestr.close();
00147   }
00148 
00149   appQueuePtr->join();
00150 
00151   delete comm;
00152   return 0;
00153 }
